_comment: Hei oversetter! Hvis du redigerer dette fra Github eller fra kodekilder, bør du gå til https://crowdin.com/project/quickshop-reremake
file-test: Dette er en test tekstfil. Vi bruker den til å teste om messages.json er ødelagt. Her kan du skrive hva som helst uten at det påvirker noe :)
translation-contributors: Bidragsytere: Timtower, Netherfoam, KaiNoMood, Mgazul, JackTheChicken and Andre_601
not-looking-at-shop: &cKunne ikke finne en QuickShop. Du må se på en butikk.
no-permission: &cDu har ikke tillatelse til å gjøre det.
3rd-plugin-build-check-failed: &cTredjeparts plugin &l{0}&r&c nektet sjekk av tillatelser. Har du satt opp korrekt tillatelser for tredjeparts pluginen?
no-creative-break: &cDu kan ikke ødelegge andre spillere sine butikker i kreativ modus. Bytt til overlevelsesmodus eller prøv å bruke superverktøyet {0} i stedet.
trading-in-creative-mode-is-disabled: &cDu kan ikke handle med denne butikken mens du er i kreativ modus.
supertool-is-disabled: &cSuperverktøyet er deaktivert. Kan ikke ødelegge butikker.
no-double-chests: &cDu kan ikke opprette en butikk med dobbelkiste.
not-managed-shop: &cDu er ikke eieren eller moderator for denne butikken
no-price-change: &cDette ville ikke resultere i en prisendring!
you-cant-afford-a-new-shop: &cDet koster {0} å opprette en ny butikk.
player-bought-from-your-store-tax: &c{0} kjøpte {1} {2} fra butikken din og du tjente {3} ({4} i skatter).
you-cant-afford-to-change-price: &cDet koster {0} å endre prisen i butikken.
shops-arent-locked: &cHusk, butikker er IKKE beskyttet fra stjeling! Hvis du vil stoppe tyver, lås det med LWC, Lockette, osv!
negative-amount: &cDu kan ikke handle med negativt beløp
not-a-number: &cDu kan bare angi et nummer, du skrev {0}.
not-a-integer: &cDu kan bare angi et nummer, du skrev {0}.
player-bought-from-your-store: &c{0} kjøpte {1} {2} fra butikken din, og du tjente {3}.
shop-out-of-stock: &5Butikken din på lokasjon {0}, {1}, {2} har gått tom for {3}!
shop-has-no-space: &cButikken har kun plass til {0} stykker til av {1}.
shop-out-of-space: &5Butikken din på lokasjon {0}, {1}, {2} er nå full.
forbidden-vanilla-behavior: &cDette er ikke mulig fordi det ikke samsvarer med vanilla atferd
shop-has-changed: &cButikken du prøvde å bruke er endret etter at du klikket på den!
buying-more-than-selling: &cADVARSEL: Du kjøper gjenstander for mer enn hva du selger de for!
owner-bypass-check: &aAlle sjekker ble ignorert. Overføringen ble gjennomført! (Du er nå eieren av butikken!)
no-enough-money-to-keep-shops: &cDu har ikke nok penger til å beholde butikkene! Alle butikker ble fjernet...
break-shop-use-supertool: &eDu kan ødelegge butikken ved å bruke superverktøyet.
failed-to-put-sign: &cIkke nok plass rundt butikken til å plassere informasjonskiltet.
failed-to-paste: &cKunne ikke laste opp data til Pastebin. Sjekk internettforbindelsen din og prøv igjen. (Se konsoll for detaljer)
warn-to-paste: &eSamler inn data for å laste den opp til Pastebin, dette kan ta en stund. &c&lAdvarsel:&c Dataene oppbevares offentlig i en uke! Det kan lekke serverkonfigurasjonen og annen sensitiv informasjon. Sørg for at du bare sender den til &lstab/utviklere du stoler på.
price-too-high: &cButikkprisen er for høy! Du kan ikke sette en pris høyere enn {0}.
you-cant-create-shop-in-there: &cDu har ikke tillatelse til å opprette en butikk på denne plasseringen.
unknown-player: &cSpilleren eksisterer ikke, sjekk om du har skrevet riktig spillernavn.
shop-staff-cleared: &aAlle ansatte ble fjernet fra din butikk.
shop-staff-added: &cDu ansatte {0} som medarbeider i din butikk.
shop-staff-deleted: &aSpiller {0} ble fjernet som medarbeider i din butikk.
no-permission-build: &cDu kan ikke lage en butikk her.
purchase-failed: &cKjøp feilet: Intern feil. Vennligst kontakt serveradministratoren.

menu.sell-tax-self: &aDu betalte ikke skatt fordi du eier denne butikken.

how-many-buy: &aSkriv i chat hvor mange du ønsker å &bKJØPE&a. Du kan kjøpe maks &e{0}&a. Skriv &ball&a om du vil kjøpe alle.
how-many-sell: &aSkriv i chat hvor mange du ønsker å &dSELGE&a. Du har &e{0}&a tilgjengelig. Skriv &ball&a for å selge alle.
not-allowed-to-create: &cDu kan ikke opprette en butikk her.
blacklisted-item: &cDu kan ikke selge denne gjenstanden fordi den er på svartelisten
how-much-to-trade-for: &aSkriv i chat hvor mye du ønsker å selge &e{1}x {0}&a for.

command.invalid-bulk-amount: &cThe given value {0} is larger than max stack size or lower than one
command.no-trade-item: &aPlease hold a trade item to change in main hand
command.wrong-args: &cInvalid argument. Use &l/qs help &cto see a list of commands.

description.title: &aQuickShop help
description.price: &eChanges the buy/sell price of a shop
description.find: &eLocates the nearest shop of a specific type.
description.refill: &eAdds a given number of items to a shop
description.create: &eCreates a new shop from the targeted chest
description.amount: &eTo set item amount (Useful when having chat issues)
description.size: &eChange per bulk amount of a shop
description.supercreate: &eCreate a shop while bypassing all protection checks
description.removeall: &eRemove ALL shops of a specified player
description.removeworld: &eRemove ALL shops in a specified world
description.currency: &eSet or remove the currency setting of the shop

command.feature-not-enabled: This feature is not enabled in the config file.

controlpanel.unlimited-hover: &eClick to toggle if the shop is unlimited.
controlpanel.mode-selling-hover: &eClick to change the shop to BUY mode.
controlpanel.mode-buying-hover: &eClick to change the shop to SELL mode.
controlpanel.price-hover: &eClick to set a new price for the item.
controlpanel.empty-hover: &eClick to clear the inventory of the shop.
controlpanel.stack-hover: &eClick to set the amount of item per bulk. Set to 1 for normal behaviour.
controlpanel.currency-hover: &eClick to set or remove the currency that this shop is using

list: {0} was released. You are still using {1}!
Surprise! {0} came out. You are on {1}
Looks like you need to update. {0} was released!
Ooops! {0} was now released. You are on {1}!
I swear, QS has been updated to {0}. Why have you not updated yet?
Fixing and re... Sorry, but {0} was released!
Err! Nope. This is not an error. {0} has been released!
OMG! {0} came out! Why are you still using {1}?
Todays News: QuickShop has been updated to {0}!
Plugin k.i.a. You should update to {0}!
There is an update available Commander. {0} has just came out!
Look my style---{0} updated. You're still using {1}
What do you think? {0} has been released! Update!
Doctor, QuickShop has a new update {0}! You should update~
Ko~ko~da~yo~ QuickShop has a new update {0} ~
updatenotify.remote-disable-warning: &cThis version of QuickShop is marked as disabled by the remote server, which means this version may have serious problem, get details from our SpigotMC page: {0}. This warning will continue to appear until you switch to a stable version, but it will not affect your server's performance.

shop-removed-cause-ongoing-fee: &cYour shop at {0} was removed because you didn't have enough money to keep it!
digits-reach-the-limit: &cYou have reached the limits of decimals in the price.
backup-failed: Cannot backup the database. Check the console for details.
translate-not-completed-yet-click: The translation of the language {0} was not completed yet by {1}. Do you want to help us improving the translation? Click here!
translate-not-completed-yet-url: The translation of the language {0} was not completed yet by {1}. Do you want to help us improving the translation? Browse: {2}
shop-now-freezed: &aYou have frozen the shop. Nobody can trade with this shop now!
shop-nolonger-freezed: &aYou unfroze the shop. It's back to normal now!
shop-cannot-trade-when-freezing: &cYou cannot trade with this shop because it is frozen.
denied-put-in-item: &cYou cannot put this item into your shop!
how-many-buy-stack: &eEnter in chat, how many bulks you wish to &bBUY&a. There are &e{0}&a items in each bulk and you can buy &e{1}&a bulks. Enter &ball&a in chat to buy all.
how-many-sell-stack: &aEnter in chat, how many bulk you wish to &dSELL&a. There are &e{0}&a items per bulk and you have &e{1}&a bulks available. Enter &ball&a in chat to sell all.
currency-not-exists: &cCannot find the currency that you want to set. Maybe the spelling is wrong or that currency isn't available in this world.
currency-unset: &aShop currency removed successfully. Using default settings now.
currency-not-support: &cThe economy plugin doesn't support the multi-economy feature.
item-not-exist: &cThe item &e{0} &cdoes not exist, please check your spelling.
console-only: &cThis command can only be executed by Console.
console-only-danger: &cThis is a dangerous command, so that only the Console can execute it.
clean-warning: &eThis command will purge &call &eshops if the shop is damaged, was created in not allowed worlds, is selling/buying not allowed items or &c&lEXISTS IN A UNLOADED WORLD&e. Make sure to create a full backup of your shop data first and use &b/qs cleanghost confirm &eto continue.
shop-creation-failed: &cShop creation failed, please contact with server administrator.
shop-owner-self-trade: &eYou trading with yourself shop, so you might won't gain any balance.
